PHRASE.LANG: Equip this choreography to dance like an American high-school student from the noughties. This dance can be performed by both male and female avatars. [#Legal]

Equipaggia questa 2000 coreografia, per ballare come un liceale americano. Per uomini e donne. [#Legal]
